**双手剑**（two-handed sword）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[近战](/index.php?title=%E8%BF%91%E6%88%98\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "近战 (page does not exist)")[武器](/wiki/%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8 "武器")。它是游戏中杀伤力最强的非[神器](/index.php?title=%E7%A5%9E%E5%99%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "神器 (page does not exist)")武器之一，也是杀伤力最强的[双手](/index.php?title=%E5%8F%8C%E6%89%8B\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "双手 (page does not exist)")武器之一。

[ ]

## 生成

双手剑在随机生成的武器中占比2.2%。

[野蛮人](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8E%E8%9B%AE%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "野蛮人 (page does not exist)")在游戏开始时有1⁄2的概率获得一把[+0](/index.php?title=%E9%99%84%E9%AD%94\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "附魔 (page does not exist)")双手剑[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。

在[Rogue关卡](/index.php?title=Rogue%E5%85%B3%E5%8D%A1\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Rogue关卡 (page does not exist)")，由[鬼魂](/index.php?title=%E9%AC%BC%E9%AD%82\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "鬼魂 (page does not exist)")守卫的假[骨档](/index.php?title=%E9%AA%A8%E6%A1%A3\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "骨档 (page does not exist)")中的武器有1⁄2的概率是双手剑，附魔值为-1到+3间的随机值，且有3⁄4的概率是被[诅咒](/index.php?title=%E8%AF%85%E5%92%92\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "诅咒 (page does not exist)")的[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)。

部分怪物生成时有概率[获得](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")双手剑：

- 具有武器攻击能力，且能够持握武器的[强壮](/index.php?title=%E5%BC%BA%E5%A3%AE\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "强壮 (page does not exist)")[人形](/index.php?title=%E4%BA%BA%E5%BD%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "人形 (page does not exist)")怪物在生成时若没有默认起始武器，则有概率获得一把双手剑：普通怪物概率为1⁄14，[领主](/index.php?title=M2_LORD/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "M2 LORD/zh-CN (page does not exist)")或[恶物](/index.php?title=%E6%81%B6%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "恶物 (page does not exist)")类怪物概率为1⁄12，[王族](/index.php?title=M2_PRINCE/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "M2 PRINCE/zh-CN (page does not exist)")类怪物，或者同时是领主和恶物的怪物概率为1⁄10，同时是王族和恶物的怪物概率为1⁄8，此类生成规则在[Rogue关卡](/index.php?title=Rogue%E5%85%B3%E5%8D%A1\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Rogue关卡 (page does not exist)")不生效[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)。
- [克罗伊斯](/index.php?title=%E5%85%8B%E7%BD%97%E4%BC%8A%E6%96%AF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "克罗伊斯 (page does not exist)")生成时会获得一把双手剑[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)。
- 所有[玩家怪物](/index.php?title=%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "玩家怪物 (page does not exist)")生成时有约1.9%的概率获得一把双手剑[\[6\]](#cite_note-6)。[野蛮人](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8E%E8%9B%AE%E4%BA%BA%EF%BC%88%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "野蛮人（玩家怪物） (page does not exist)")职业的玩家怪物生成时获得的武器有1⁄4的概率被替换为双手剑[\[7\]](#cite_note-7)。

## 双手剑技能

| 双手剑  |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| ---- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 最大等级 | [角色](/index.php?title=%E8%A7%92%E8%89%B2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "角色 (page does not exist)")                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| 基础   | - [盗贼](/index.php?title=%E7%9B%97%E8%B4%BC\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "盗贼 (page does not exist)")、[游客](/index.php?title=%E6%B8%B8%E5%AE%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "游客 (page does not exist)")                                                                                                                    |
| 熟练   | * [骑士](/index.php?title=%E9%AA%91%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "骑士 (page does not exist)")                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| 老练   | - [野蛮人](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8E%E8%9B%AE%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "野蛮人 (page does not exist)")、[武士](/index.php?title=%E6%AD%A6%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "武士 (page does not exist)")、[女武神](/index.php?title=%E5%A5%B3%E6%AD%A6%E7%A5%9E\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "女武神 (page does not exist)") |

双手剑和[武士剑](/wiki/%E6%AD%A6%E5%A3%AB%E5%89%91 "武士剑")使用双手剑技能。

[妖刀村正](/index.php?title=%E5%A6%96%E5%88%80%E6%9D%91%E6%AD%A3\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "妖刀村正 (page does not exist)")是唯一使用双手剑技能的[神器武器](/index.php?title=%E7%A5%9E%E5%99%A8%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "神器武器 (page does not exist)")。

## 策略

- *主条目：[双手武器](/index.php?title=%E5%8F%8C%E6%89%8B%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "双手武器 (page does not exist)")*

由于其高伤害，双手剑是游戏早期极佳的武器选择，尤其是对于[游客](/index.php?title=%E6%B8%B8%E5%AE%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "游客 (page does not exist)")这样的前期较弱的角色。但它们[在被诅咒时会带来较大麻烦](/index.php?title=%E5%8F%8C%E6%89%8B%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "双手武器 (page does not exist)")，因此在[游戏中期](/index.php?title=%E6%B8%B8%E6%88%8F%E9%98%B6%E6%AE%B5\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "游戏阶段 (page does not exist)")之后就很少有玩家选择。你可以通过[倒出](/index.php?title=%E5%80%92%E5%87%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "倒出 (page does not exist)")指令将[解除诅咒](/index.php?title=%E8%A7%A3%E9%99%A4%E8%AF%85%E5%92%92\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "解除诅咒 (page does not exist)")用的物品从随身的[包裹](/index.php?title=%E5%8C%85%E8%A3%B9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "包裹 (page does not exist)")里倒出来，不过大多数玩家还是选择使用单手武器或抗诅咒的武器以避免此类麻烦。

## 历史

双手剑自[Jay Fenlason's Hack](/wiki/Jay_Fenlason%27s_Hack "Jay Fenlason's Hack")的变体Hack 1.21和PDP-11版Hack开始就存在于游戏中，也是最初出现在[Hack 1.0](/wiki/Hack_1.0 "Hack 1.0")的武器之一。

从[Hack 1.0](/wiki/Hack_1.0 "Hack 1.0")到[NetHack 3.0.10](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.10 "NetHack 3.0.10")，双手剑可以通过[命名](/index.php?title=%E5%91%BD%E5%90%8D\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "命名 (page does not exist)")转化为[杀兽剑](/index.php?title=%E6%9D%80%E5%85%BD%E5%89%91\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "杀兽剑 (page does not exist)")，使得它可以对[兽人](/index.php?title=%E5%85%BD%E4%BA%BA%EF%BC%88%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "兽人（怪物） (page does not exist)")造成额外的d10伤害。在[NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0")前，玩家可以通过该方法获得多把杀兽剑。在[Hack 1.0.2](/wiki/Hack_1.0.2 "Hack 1.0.2")前，任何武器都可以通过命名转化为“杀兽”武器。自[NetHack 3.1.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.1.0 "NetHack 3.1.0")开始，杀兽剑的[基础物品](/index.php?title=%E5%9F%BA%E7%A1%80%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "基础物品 (page does not exist)")改为[精灵阔剑](/wiki/%E7%B2%BE%E7%81%B5%E9%98%94%E5%89%91 "精灵阔剑")。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Two-handed_sword/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

### SLASH'EM

[SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") adds [Deathsword](/wiki/Deathsword "Deathsword"), an artifact two-handed sword that is the second [sacrifice gift](/wiki/Sacrifice_gift "Sacrifice gift") for Barbarians.

### SporkHack

In [SporkHack](/wiki/SporkHack "SporkHack"), successfully untrapping a [land mine](/wiki/Land_mine "Land mine") [trap](/wiki/Trap "Trap") may generate a two-handed sword instead of a land mine item - this is a dual [pun](/wiki/Pun "Pun") on [claymore swords](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Claymore "wikipedia:Claymore") and [claymore mines](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Claymore "wikipedia:Claymore").

SporkHack introduces [Lifestealer](/wiki/Lifestealer "Lifestealer"), an artifact two-handed sword that functions similarly to [Stormbringer](/wiki/Stormbringer "Stormbringer") and is generated in the hands of [Vlad the Impaler](/wiki/Vlad_the_Impaler "Vlad the Impaler") - a comment in the code indicates that the choice of [base item](/wiki/Base_item "Base item") was deliberate to try and deter players from using the artifact themselves, as two-handed weapons were still considered unpopular at the time (and still are to an extent).

### UnNetHack

In [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack"), [Thiefbane](/wiki/Thiefbane "Thiefbane") is an artifact two-handed sword carried by [One-eyed Sam](/wiki/Black_market_\(UnNetHack\)#One-eyed_Sam "Black market (UnNetHack)"), the black market proprietor.

### dNetHack

[dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") adds the [droven greatsword](/wiki/Droven_greatsword "Droven greatsword"), [white vibrozanbato](/index.php?title=White_vibrozanbato\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "White vibrozanbato (page does not exist)") and [gold-bladed vibrozanbato](/index.php?title=Gold-bladed_vibrozanbato\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Gold-bladed vibrozanbato (page does not exist)") as weapons that use the two-handed sword skill.

Carrying [The Black Crystal](/wiki/The_Black_Crystal "The Black Crystal") increases a character's skill cap in two-handed swords by one. [Dantalion](/wiki/Dantalion "Dantalion") is a [spirit](/wiki/Spirits_\(dNetHack\) "Spirits (dNetHack)") that grants skill in two-handed swords while bound.

[Aurumach Rilmani](/wiki/Aurumach_Rilmani "Aurumach Rilmani") always generate with a [gold](/wiki/Gold_\(material\) "Gold (material)") two-handed sword enchanted to at least +4, and [wandering githyanki pirates](/wiki/Wandering_pirate#Githyanki_pirate "Wandering pirate") are generated with a two-handed sword.

There are many artifact two-handed swords:

- The [Atlantean Royal Sword](/wiki/Atlantean_Royal_Sword "Atlantean Royal Sword") is a neutral artifact that favors Barbarians, and is the first guaranteed sacrifice gift for Barbarians that start with a two-handed sword. It has +1d3 [to-hit](/wiki/To-hit "To-hit") and deals double damage, and automatically [shatters](/wiki/Shatter "Shatter") the wielded weapons of targets it hits - Barbarians can also wield it in the offhand.
- [Sol Valtiva](/wiki/Sol_Valtiva_\(dNetHack\) "Sol Valtiva (dNetHack)") is a chaotic [obsidian](/wiki/Obsidian "Obsidian") two-handed sword that favors [fire giants](/wiki/Fire_giant "Fire giant"), and is the signature weapon of [Lord Surtur](/wiki/Lord_Surtur "Lord Surtur").
- [Genocide](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#Genocide "DNetHack artifacts") is a lawful large [intelligent artifact](/wiki/Intelligent_artifact "Intelligent artifact") that is wielded by [Bael](/wiki/Bael "Bael"). It has +1d10 to-hit and deals +1d20 [fire](/wiki/Fire "Fire") damage against targets without [fire resistance](/wiki/Fire_resistance "Fire resistance"), while dealing +6d6 fire damage to all monsters of the same race (or monster type if race does not apply) on the current level - if a monster is killed by that fire damage, a fiery explosion that deals 6d6 damage occurs centered on the monster. While the fire damage from this secondary attack does not affect the victim's inventory, the subsequent explosion can burn items in its range.
- [Doomscreamer](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#Doomscreamer "DNetHack artifacts") is a chaotic and intelligent artifact wielded by [Graz'zt](/index.php?title=Graz%27zt_\(dNetHack\)\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Graz'zt (dNetHack) (page does not exist)"). It has +1 to-hit and deals double damage against targets without [acid resistance](/wiki/Acid_resistance "Acid resistance"), and grants acid resistance when wielded.
- [The Sword of Onoel](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#Sword_of_Onoel "DNetHack artifacts") is a lawful and large intelligent artifact that is made of [silver](/wiki/Silver "Silver") and grants +1d7 to-hit and +1d10 damage versus all monsters. While wielded, the Sword of Onoel grants [automatic searching](/wiki/Automatic_searching "Automatic searching") and [blindness resistance](/wiki/Blindness_resistance "Blindness resistance"), and acts as a [light source](/wiki/Light_source "Light source"); targets that it strikes may be [blinded](/wiki/Blind "Blind"), [gremlins](/wiki/Gremlin "Gremlin") are reduced to dust, and [trolls](/wiki/Troll_\(monster_class\) "Troll (monster class)") are [petrified](/wiki/Petrified "Petrified").

### xNetHack

In [xNetHack](/wiki/XNetHack "XNetHack"), the [Valkyrie](/wiki/Valkyrie "Valkyrie") [quest artifact](/wiki/Quest_artifact "Quest artifact") is changed to [Sol Valtiva](/wiki/Sol_Valtiva_\(xNetHack\) "Sol Valtiva (xNetHack)"), a chaotic artifact two-handed sword made of [mithril](/wiki/Mithril "Mithril") that is the signature weapon of Lord Surtur.

### notdNetHack

In [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"), in addition to dNetHack details, Dantalion is generated with an artifact two-handed sword called [The Dread of Dantalion](/wiki/The_Dread_of_Dantalion "The Dread of Dantalion") when summoned by an [Illithanachronounbinder](/wiki/Illithanachronounbinder "Illithanachronounbinder").

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), [The Sword of Kas](/wiki/The_Sword_of_Kas "The Sword of Kas") is an artifact two-handed sword that appears in the hands of [Kas](/wiki/Kas "Kas"). EvilHack also adds Lifestealer from SporkHack.

双手剑（two-handed sword）是NetHack中的一种近战武器。它是游戏中杀伤力最强的非神器武器之一，也是杀伤力最强的双手武器之一。

生成

双手剑在随机生成的武器中占比2.2%。

野蛮人在游戏开始时有1⁄2的概率获得一把+0双手剑[1][2]。

在Rogue关卡，由鬼魂守卫的假骨档中的武器有1⁄2的概率是双手剑，附魔值为-1到+3间的随机值，且有3⁄4的概率是被诅咒的[3]。

部分怪物生成时有概率获得双手剑：

  • 具有武器攻击能力，且能够持握武器的强壮人形怪物在生成时若没有默认起始武器，则有概率获得一把双手剑：普通怪物概率为1⁄14，领主或恶物类怪物概率为1⁄12，王族类怪物，或者同时是领主和恶物的怪物概率为1⁄10，同时是王族和恶物的怪物概率为1⁄8，此类生成规则在Rogue关卡不生效[4]。
  • 克罗伊斯生成时会获得一把双手剑[5]。
  • 所有玩家怪物生成时有约1.9%的概率获得一把双手剑[6]。野蛮人职业的玩家怪物生成时获得的武器有1⁄4的概率被替换为双手剑[7]。

双手剑技能

双手剑
最大等级 角色
基础
  • 盗贼、游客
熟练
  • 骑士
老练
  • 野蛮人、武士、女武神

双手剑和武士剑使用双手剑技能。

妖刀村正是唯一使用双手剑技能的神器武器。

策略

主条目：双手武器

由于其高伤害，双手剑是游戏早期极佳的武器选择，尤其是对于游客这样的前期较弱的角色。但它们在被诅咒时会带来较大麻烦，因此在游戏中期之后就很少有玩家选择。你可以通过倒出指令将解除诅咒用的物品从随身的包裹里倒出来，不过大多数玩家还是选择使用单手武器或抗诅咒的武器以避免此类麻烦。

历史

双手剑自Jay Fenlason's Hack的变体Hack 1.21和PDP-11版Hack开始就存在于游戏中，也是最初出现在Hack 1.0的武器之一。

从Hack 1.0到NetHack 3.0.10，双手剑可以通过命名转化为杀兽剑，使得它可以对兽人造成额外的d10伤害。在NetHack 3.0.0前，玩家可以通过该方法获得多把杀兽剑。在Hack 1.0.2前，任何武器都可以通过命名转化为“杀兽”武器。自NetHack 3.1.0开始，杀兽剑的基础物品改为精灵阔剑。

Variants

此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。
您可以帮助我们翻译此页面，但请勿使用机器翻译。

SLASH'EM

SLASH'EM adds Deathsword, an artifact two-handed sword that is the second sacrifice gift for Barbarians.

SporkHack

In SporkHack, successfully untrapping a land mine trap may generate a two-handed sword instead of a land mine item - this is a dual pun on claymore swords and claymore mines.

SporkHack introduces Lifestealer, an artifact two-handed sword that functions similarly to Stormbringer and is generated in the hands of Vlad the Impaler - a comment in the code indicates that the choice of base item was deliberate to try and deter players from using the artifact themselves, as two-handed weapons were still considered unpopular at the time (and still are to an extent).

UnNetHack

In UnNetHack, Thiefbane is an artifact two-handed sword carried by One-eyed Sam, the black market proprietor.

dNetHack

dNetHack adds the droven greatsword, white vibrozanbato and gold-bladed vibrozanbato as weapons that use the two-handed sword skill.

Carrying The Black Crystal increases a character's skill cap in two-handed swords by one. Dantalion is a spirit that grants skill in two-handed swords while bound.

Aurumach Rilmani always generate with a gold two-handed sword enchanted to at least +4, and wandering githyanki pirates are generated with a two-handed sword.

There are many artifact two-handed swords:

  • The Atlantean Royal Sword is a neutral artifact that favors Barbarians, and is the first guaranteed sacrifice gift for Barbarians that start with a two-handed sword. It has +1d3 to-hit and deals double damage, and automatically shatters the wielded weapons of targets it hits - Barbarians can also wield it in the offhand.
  • Sol Valtiva is a chaotic obsidian two-handed sword that favors fire giants, and is the signature weapon of Lord Surtur.
  • Genocide is a lawful large intelligent artifact that is wielded by Bael. It has +1d10 to-hit and deals +1d20 fire damage against targets without fire resistance, while dealing +6d6 fire damage to all monsters of the same race (or monster type if race does not apply) on the current level - if a monster is killed by that fire damage, a fiery explosion that deals 6d6 damage occurs centered on the monster. While the fire damage from this secondary attack does not affect the victim's inventory, the subsequent explosion can burn items in its range.
  • Doomscreamer is a chaotic and intelligent artifact wielded by Graz'zt. It has +1 to-hit and deals double damage against targets without acid resistance, and grants acid resistance when wielded.
  • The Sword of Onoel is a lawful and large intelligent artifact that is made of silver and grants +1d7 to-hit and +1d10 damage versus all monsters. While wielded, the Sword of Onoel grants automatic searching and blindness resistance, and acts as a light source; targets that it strikes may be blinded, gremlins are reduced to dust, and trolls are petrified.

xNetHack

In xNetHack, the Valkyrie quest artifact is changed to Sol Valtiva, a chaotic artifact two-handed sword made of mithril that is the signature weapon of Lord Surtur.

notdNetHack

In notdNetHack, in addition to dNetHack details, Dantalion is generated with an artifact two-handed sword called The Dread of Dantalion when summoned by an Illithanachronounbinder.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, The Sword of Kas is an artifact two-handed sword that appears in the hands of Kas. EvilHack also adds Lifestealer from SporkHack.
